website_summaries.verdict: The Gaems M-240 Professional Gaming Monitor is a 24-inch display designed for gamers by gamers. It's built for travel and delivers booming audio, but its overall performance is middling.
cons: Middling gray-scale and color performance in testing

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but bigger than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound, but I really didn't like the Matte screen. Also it's a lot bigger than it appears. The description on the page lists it as 28" wide but it's closer to 3 feet. Needless to say it's not as portable as it's advertised to be. I decided to stick with the GEAMS M155 portable monitor, It's picture isn't as nice but it's way more portable which is what I personally needed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Knight

customer_reviews.title: I was literally blown away....but then...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best display product I've ever seen. The picture is amazing and ridiculously crisp. Plenty of options for adjustments, which was my gripe with the Gaems Vanguard. Very well built and the handle on the back is fantastic for portability. Very highly recommended! Update* After using the monitor for a couple hours I turned it on the next day and surprise....dead pixels. Sending it back for replacement. It is a great product, unfortunately mine is defective.

product_meta.title: GAEMS M240 Professional Gaming Monitor
product_meta.description: Is the lag on your gaming system killing you? GAEMS customers expect virtually lag free gaming experiences with quality sound and a unique ability to safely and conveniently game anywhere. We designed the M240 Professional Gaming Monitor with all of these expectations in mind. So stop sacrificing your lives and your standards and start playing smarter. Built to be the best VG/PC gaming experience on the market, this killer 24" 60 hz portable monitor will help you lag less and live longer. The M-240 will bring your gaming to a whole new level. Professional gamers and video streamers (or those aspiring to become either) will appreciate the ultra-fast performance of our 24" 1080p HD LED monitor. Best in class audio is achieved through proprietary "Dynamic Sound Stage" technology utilizing 4 chambered speakers and passive subwoofer. Dedicated HDMI output improves the video and audio capture performance while at the same time eliminating the need to use splitters and other non-reliable solutions. Having twin HDMI inputs makes it easy to connect 2 consoles or a console and PC to the same monitor for editing and stream capture. Want better bass? GAEMS provides a subwoofer only output port alongside the 3.5mm audio output jack. Turn the VESA mount handle 180 degrees and it doubles as a handle. Attach the protective cover and feel secure taking your monitor to another room, to a LAN event or even on a plane for work or vacation! Why leave your best monitor at home? Casual gamers will also enjoy out of box settings for console and PC use without the need to tweak every setting every time.
feature_bullets: VESA mounted stand rotates as a carry handle
2X HDMI dedicated inputs plus 1 HDMI Output
